original_description: Deals 15 damage.
translated_description: Causa 15 de dano.

original_description: Gain 12 <color=#A7C039>Dodge</color>.
translated_description: Ganhe 12 de <color=#A7C039>Esquiva</color>.

original_description: Deal 20 damage. Apply 2 <color=#A7C039>Mark</color>. Marked targets take 50% more damage.
translated_description: Cause 20 de dano. Aplique 2 de <color=#A7C039>Marca</color>. Alvos marcados recebem 50% a mais de dano.

original_description: Deal 15 damage. Add a copy of this card into your discard pile.
translated_description: Causa 15 de dano. Adiciona uma cópia desta carta à sua pilha de descarte.

original_description: Deal damage equal to your current <color=#A7C039>Dodge</color>.
translated_description: Causa dano igual à sua <color=#A7C039>Esquiva</color> atual.

original_description: Deal 20 damage to ALL enemies.
translated_description: Causa 20 de dano a TODOS os inimigos.

original_description: Deal 30 damage. Apply 2 <color=#A7C039>Crippled</color>. Crippled units deal 25% less damage.
translated_description: Causa 30 de dano. Aplica 2 de <color=#A7C039>Aleijado</color>. Unidades aleijadas causam 25% menos dano.

original_description: 4 <color=#A7C039>Psycho</color>. Psycho adds additional damage to your attacks.
translated_description: 4 de <color=#A7C039>Psycho</color>. Psycho adiciona dano extra aos seus ataques.

original_description: Deal 35 damage. Psycho affects this card 3 times.
translated_description: Causa 35 de dano. Psycho afeta esta carta 3 vezes.

original_description: Deal 22 damage. Draw 1 card.
translated_description: Causa 22 de dano. Compre 1 carta.

original_description: Gain 20 <color=#A7C039>Dodge</color>. Draw 1 card.
translated_description: Ganhe 20 de <color=#A7C039>Esquiva</color>. Compre 1 carta.

original_description: Deal 7 damage to a random enemy 3 times.
translated_description: Causa 7 de dano a um inimigo aleatório 3 vezes.

original_description: Lose 7 HP. Gain 2 <color=#A7C039>Action Points</color>.
translated_description: Perca 7 de PV. Ganhe 2 <color=#A7C039>Pontos de Ação</color>.

original_description: Deal 50 damage. Removed until the end of combat.
translated_description: Causa 50 de dano. Removido até o final do combate.

original_description: Double your <color=#A7C039>Dodge</color>.
translated_description: Dobra sua <color=#A7C039>Esquiva</color>.

original_description: At the start of each turn, gain 4 <color=#A7C039>Psycho</color>. Psycho adds additional damage to your attacks.
translated_description: No início de cada turno, ganhe 4 de <color=#A7C039>Psycho</color>. Psycho adiciona dano extra aos seus ataques.

original_description: This turn, your next attack deals TWICE damage.
translated_description: Neste turno, seu próximo ataque causa o DOBRO de dano.

original_description: Gain 75 <color=#A7C039>Dodge</color>. Removed until the end of combat.
translated_description: Ganhe 75 de <color=#A7C039>Esquiva</color>. Removido até o final do combate.

original_description: Deals 10 damage to ALL enemies. Heal HP equal to the damage dealt.
translated_description: Causa 10 de dano a TODOS os inimigos. Cura PV igual ao dano causado.

original_description: Deals 80 damage.
translated_description: Causa 80 de dano.

original_description: Unplayable.
translated_description: Não jogável.

original_description: Unplayable.
translated_description: Não jogável.

original_description: Unplayable.
translated_description: Não jogável.
